quote: Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you'll start having positive results.
Positive thinking must be followed by positive doing.
In order to carry a positive action, we must develop here a positive vision.
The way to happiness: keep your heart free from hate, your mind from worry. Live simply, expect little, give much.
Dwell on the beauty of life. Watch the stars and see yourself running with them.
Perpetual optimism is a force multiplier.
Pessimism leads to weakness; optimism to power.
Say something positive, and you’ll see something positive.
Choose to be optimistic; it feels better.
Be thankful for what you have; you'll end up having more.
If you concentrate on what you don’t have, you will never, ever have enough.
Magic is believing in yourself, if you can do that, you can make anything happen.
Stop stressing. Stop worrying. Give rest to the problems weighing you down.
Dwell in possibility.
When you’re positive, good things happen.
Live life to the fullest, and focus on the positive.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
You are the architect of your own happiness.
Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.
Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
Opportunities don’t happen. You create them.
If something is important enough, even if the odds are against you, you should still do it.
What you think, you become.
Your mind is a powerful thing. When you fill it with positive thoughts, your life will start to change.
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
Be so happy that, when others look at you, they become happy too.
Every day may not be good, but there is something good in every day.
Think of all the beauty still left around you and be happy.
Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
When you focus on the good, the good gets better.
Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
You’re braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
A positive attitude causes a chain reaction of positive thoughts, events and outcomes.
The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.
Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
When you can’t find the sunshine, be the sunshine.
One small positive thought in the morning can change your whole day.
Happiness is an inside job.
The only place where your dream becomes impossible is in your own thinking.
You can’t have a positive life and a negative mind.
Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change their future by merely changing their attitude.
Positive anything is better than negative nothing.
The struggle you’re in today is developing the strength you need tomorrow.
Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
Turn your wounds into wisdom.
The mind is everything. What you think, you become.
You were born to win, but to be a winner, you must plan to win, prepare to win, and expect to win.
The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
The best way to predict the future is to create it.
Optimism is the one quality more associated with success and happiness than any other.
Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.
The sun himself is weak when he first rises, and gathers strength and courage as the day gets on.
The positive thinker sees the invisible, feels the intangible, and achieves the impossible.
Start each day with a grateful heart.
You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
The more light you allow within you, the brighter the world you live in will be.
A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
The only time you fail is when you fall down and stay down.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself as to why you can’t achieve it.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
If you don’t like the road you’re walking, start paving another one.
Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
You don’t have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
The best revenge is massive success.
The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
Your time is limited, don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
If you want to achieve greatness, stop asking for permission.
Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
The only thing that overcomes hard luck is hard work.
You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.
The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
Don’t count the days, make the days count.
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.
If you can dream it, you can do it.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
You don’t have to be perfect to be amazing.
Your life is your message to the world. Make sure it’s inspiring.
